【考法 1】 v. 责备：to scold mildly so as to correct or improve
【例】My wife chided me for forgetting to offer our guests some refreshments. 我妻子责备我忘记给客人们点心。
【近】reprove, reprimand, reproach, tick off
【反】praise, commend 称赞
